title: ranked
body: why do i have to carry every game? i was told this was a team game and there isnt no fcking teamplay about having to 1v5 everygame either i do good or bad it doesnt matter because my team always do bad nothing to do

replies.body:
I must support this. I just had a bronze 4 jungle.. THAT had finished placements. In a silver game. I got a iron 4 adc when I was que for top support. 
This is crap. When you are in a tier of iron you play with bronze 4 or iron. NOT SILVER!!!!

I am in silver 4 not playing with plat players. WHY IS IRON AND B4 PLAYING IN SILVER GAMES.
I shouldn't have to carry them and say " Put a ward here. Check your mini map every 15 seconds or when someone pings " I should be with players that are doing this.
Rank in pre season was trash. Iron 4 players in adc role standing still to hit something endlessly. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
